snippet.title: Nova Hearts: The Spark - Release trailer (First Chapter)
snippet.description:
Play the first chapter now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2506290/Nova_hearts/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=direct&utm_campaign=spark&utm_content=trailer
The full game will be available in 2025.

The Spark is the first chapter and introduction to the world of Nova Hearts. As the main character Luce, players will meet the game’s flirty and thirsty cast of characters and their cosmic alter-egos, learn the basics of the stylish turn-based combat, and embark on a quest to unravel the magical mystery at the heart of it all. TEXT, DATE and FIGHT!

Website: https://www.novaheartsgame.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/UrbUgkVrMj
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/NovaHearts_news
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LightbulbCrew
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/novahearts_game/

Trailer Maker: Suzanne Wallace
Cinematics: Histeria! Studio
Original music: mdois & Nellia
SFX: mdois & Nicolas Isnard
Mix: Nicolas Isnard
